scripts.copy-assets: cp -r images build/extension && cp manifest.json build/extension
scripts.create-zip: cp key.pem build/extension && cd build/extension && zip -r ../tab-eraser.zip * && rm key.pem
scripts.build: npm run test && npm run clean && npm run copy-assets && webpack --config=webpack.config.js && npm run copy-assets
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run create-zip
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run copy-assets && webpack --watch --config=webpack.config.js
